contribute-message: See something you like? Want to help? Visit https://github.com/nodejs/website to contribute

home.nightly_releases:
{{link 'Nightly releases' 'https://iojs.org/download/nightly/'}} are available for testing,
also {{link 'nightlies for the next major version' 'https://iojs.org/download/next-nightly/'}} of io.js.
home.short_description: {{link 'website'}} is an {{link 'npm'}} compatible platform originally based on {{link 'nodejs'}}.
home.news_link:
{{link 'Weekly Update – September 18th' 'https://medium.com/node-js-javascript/node-js-news-september-18th-c879f372abd7'}}
featuring core and community updates ({{link 'News Archive on Medium' 'https://medium.com/@iojs/latest'}})

deprecation.title: io.js has merged with the Node.js project again.
deprecation.content:
There won't be any further io.js releases. All of the features in io.js are available in Node.js v4 and above.
{{link 'Visit nodejs.org' 'https://nodejs.org'}} {{link 'Download latest Node.js version' 'https://nodejs.org/en/download/'}}
